definition: Data that cannot reasonably be used to infer information about or otherwise be linked to an identified or identifiable individual or device linked to such individual
technical_requirements: Data rendered non-identifiable using appropriate technical measures; Reasonable assurance data cannot be re-identified through technical means; Cannot combine with other information to identify individual or device
organizational_requirements: Public commitment not to attempt to re-identify data; Contractual obligations on data recipients not to re-identify; Policies and procedures to maintain de-identified status
